tech.tablesaw.api

Interface CategoricalColumn

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Column
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IntConvertibleColumn, NumberColumn
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanColumn, DateColumn, DoubleColumn, StringColumn

    public interface CategoricalColumn
extends Column
    A column type that can be summarized, or serve as a grouping variable in cross tabs or other aggregation operations.

    The column data is discrete.

    Supporting subtypes include: - StringColumn - BooleanColumn - DateColumn, - others

    Floating point types (float, double) and near-continuous time columns (Time and DateTime) are not included.
